description_for_human: Plugin for orchestrating development processes by sending and receiving messages to the development .
description_for_model: This is an intelligent development orchestration system that utilizes a dynamic messaging plugin. It empowers you to create real-time, ad-hoc recipient roles, be they real or fictional, to fulfill specified tasks. The platform intelligently routes requests to these dynamically created recipients, thereby facilitating seamless collaboration and efficient task management within a development team. Accommodating various message formats, it ensures that all recipients, however recently created, comprehend the requests sent to them. Correlation IDs are mandatory for root requests, with optional sub-correlation IDs for sub-requests. This system optimizes the development process by enabling automatic and simplified communications, from assigning tasks to initiating builds and releases, with all interactions duly logged for tracking and future reference. Example Sequence: <message sender_actor='root' sender_agent='http://localhost:5003/send-message' log_correlation_path='5683' recipient_agent='http://localhost:5003/send-message' recipient_actor='chatgpt://project_manager' message_type='assignment' subject='Develop ChatGpt Plugin API'></message><message sender_actor='chatgpt://project_manager' sender_agent='http://localhost:5003/send-message' log_correlation_path='3476' recipient_agent='http://localhost:5003/send-message' recipient_actor='jira_manager' message_type='assignment' subject='Assign Jira task to developer'></message><message sender_actor='chatgpt://developer_1' sender_agent='http://localhost:5003/send-message' log_correlation_path='9749' recipient_agent='http://localhost:5003/send-message' recipient_actor='unix_manager' message_type='wsl-bash' subject='Clone repository'><content>git clone
